Job Description
Our client is seeking a Senior C++ Developer/ Architect to join the New York office. Working in a small team environment, you will be exposed to some of the hardest problems of the industry. You will be evaluating and testing the latest and greatest of the hardware and software available. You will be reporting directly to CTO ensuring the business processes are implemented as required. This role provides a great opportunity to gain experience on a cutting edge of a technology world.

Responsibilities
  • Enhance trading strategies and algorithms.
  • Perform statistical analyses to verify and optimize innovations and enhancements to trading models.
  • Write functional documentation for use by software developers.
  • Collaborate closely with software developers in the testing process.


Suggested Skills
  • Experience with Python and SQL.
  • Familiar with Linux.
  • Experience with R or MATLAB.
  • Highly proficient in statistics.
  • Experience developing financial models preferred.
  • Experience with big data or with automated trading is a plus.
  • The ideal candidate will have at least 1-3 years of financial markets experience.
  • Highly detailed and well-organized.


Education
  • Graduate degree in statistics, math, science, or another quantitative discipline.


If you would like to be considered for the position of Quantitative Researcher, or wish to discuss the role further then please leave your details below. Your resume will be held in confidence until you connect with a member of our team
